meta.title: Jochre3 OCR Search Engine
meta.description: Search text content of documents OCR'd using Jochre3.

search.excludeAuthors: Checking this box will exclude selected authors from the query
search.related-word-forms-tooltip: Checking this box will exclude related word forms (of the same stem/lemma) in search results (e.g. 'eat, 'eaten', 'ate')
search.field-instructions: *These fields accept Roman or Yiddish characters.
search.author: Author
search.title: Book title
search.document-reference-placeholder: Add document references separated by a comma

facets.title: Filter by author
facets.what-are-facets: These are the authors with the most books matching your search criteria. Click an author name to filter/narrow your search results.

results.author: Author
results.none: Uh-oh! Your query did not return any results
results.word-fix-instructions: (Double-click on a word to make an OCR correction)

fix-word.title: Fix a word
fix-word.instructions: Please copy the above exactly below, including punctuation (niqqud, apostrophes, quotes, dashes and so on).
fix-word.warning: Do not correct unclear text, i.e. text that is broken, partially visible etc.
fix-word.unauthenticated: In order to fix a word, please login first.

large-image.title: Page {0} for {1}
large-image.image-alt: An image of the text on {0}

fix-metadata.title: Update metadata for "{0}"

instructions.authors: This individual may already be in our database under a different name.
instructions.authorsInstruction: If so, choose the best name below.

fix-metadata.unauthenticated: In order to fix document meta data, please login first.

transcribed-text.generating-book-view: Generating a book view of the transcription. Please wait...
